tidytable 0.3.0

Reference

All functions

as_dt()

Safely work with data.tables

dt()

Pipeable data.table call

dt_bind_rows() dt_bind_cols()

Bind data.tables by row and column

dt_case()

Case when

dt_count()

Count observations by group

dt_distinct()

Select distinct/unique rows

dt_drop_na()

Drop rows containing missing values

dt_fill()

Fill in missing values with previous or next value

dt_group_nest()

Nest data.tables

dt_group_split()

Split data frame by groups

dt_left_join() dt_inner_join() dt_right_join() dt_full_join() dt_anti_join()

Join two data.tables together

dt_map_lgl() dt_map_int() dt_map_dbl() dt_map_chr() dt_map_dfc() dt_map_dfr() dt_walk() dt_map2() dt_map2_lgl() dt_map2_int() dt_map2_dbl() dt_map2_chr() dt_map2_dfc() dt_map2_dfr()

Apply a function to each element of a vector

dt_mutate() dt_filter() dt_arrange() dt_summarize() dt_summarise() dt_select()

dplyr verbs for data.table

dt_mutate_if() dt_mutate_at() dt_mutate_across() dt_mutate_all()

Mutate

dt_pivot_longer()

Pivot data from wide to long

dt_pivot_wider()

Pivot data from long to wide

dt_pull()

Pull out a single variable

dt_relocate()

Relocate a column to a new position

dt_rename()

Rename variables by name

dt_rename_all() dt_rename_at() dt_rename_across() dt_rename_if()

Rename a selection of variables

dt_replace_na()

Replace missing values

dt_select_if()

Select variables

dt_slice() dt_slice_head() dt_slice_tail() dt_slice_max() dt_slice_min()

Choose rows by position

dt_starts_with() dt_contains() dt_ends_with() dt_everything()

Select helpers

dt_top_n()

Select top (or bottom) n rows (by value)

dt_unnest_legacy()

Unnest a nested data.table

`%notin%`

notin operator

inv_gc()

Run invisible garbage collection
